channel.title: [PI] Rune2006 Developer Applications
channel.description:
Now, before you say this is another Fail Remake, atleast wait till the server is released before you say shit please. ---------------------------------------------------------------------- What positions am I looking for?: Web Developer, Content Developer and Beta Testers --- All of which must be able to use Hamachi for testing purposes. (When released will be run on uTorrent).
[PI] Rune2006 [Remake] What I have done: [50%]When you login you get an character design interface. [100%] Cooks Assistant Quest (All items obtainable) [100%] Shortcuts (To sheep farm, To varrock, 1more forgot location) [color=orange] [75%] Npcs in all locations! [25%] Gates to; ( Cows chickens, farmer fred.
Many more done!
What I need you to do: Whatever I havent done up their :).
Application Format(If not used, you will not be considered):
[code] Desired Username: Position applying for: Experience: Proof experience: Skype: Can use Hamachi(Yes or No): [/code]

item.title: [PI] Rune2006 Developer Applications
item.dc:creator: @The_Unholy The Unholy
item.description:
@The_Unholy wrote:

Desired Username: Mod Jinxx
Position applying for: Content Developer
Experience: I’m very experienced with making remakes using PI and Delta bases.
Proof experience: I have uploaded an old unfinished Remake (Delta), I also have one that hasn’t been uploaded (PI) Which I can show you privately since I do not intend to release it.
Skype: tehepicninjapig
Can use Hamachi(Yes or No): Yes

Read full topic
